title: Missionary Work
subtitle: Missionary Work in general
author: Jincheng
description: A forum discussing missionary work in general. You can also find more about the missions of our members oversea.

topics_list.title: Israel and missionary work
topics_list.author: Francois
topics_list.content: What are the specificities  of Israel as a missionary land? Since this is the only Jewish country in the world, with a large muslim minority, how would you approach the missionary work?         What is the percentage of Christians there?

topics_list.title: Reducers
topics_list.author: Francois
topics_list.content: They are useful for sure. But for religion, I'm not sure... That's an open question, I'd say.

topics_list.title: Flux
topics_list.author: Simon
topics_list.content: What other design could be suitable? Maybe there is something simpler than redux.. And I have a problem with this car image. Is it appropriate?

title: General discussion
subtitle: About anything and everything
author: Francois
description: This is meant to exchange about trivial topics.

posts_list.title: What is the best Samgyeopsal place in Korea????
posts_list.author: Francois
posts_list.content: I am hungry. I like the Samgyeopsal from Jeju. This is divine.

posts_list.title: Camping
posts_list.author: Simon
posts_list.content: I am looking for a tent that could host 10 people at once. It is a plus if it has air con and the bible written in czech, but i'll be fine with the regular barbecue-equiped model as well

title: Worship
subtitle: Worshiping schedules and activities
author: Francois
description: This is meant to exchange about trivial topics.

posts_list.title: Sunday regular meetings schedule
posts_list.author: Francois
posts_list.content: Worship: 10am. Study: 1pm. Gospel training: 5pm. Each activity lasts for one hour. Between, we play ping pong!!
